createalias.name: CreateAlias
createalias.description: Grants permission to create a user-friendly name for a Key

createkey.name: CreateKey
createkey.description: Grants permission to create a unique customer managed key in the caller's AWS account and region

decryptdata.name: DecryptData
decryptdata.description: Grants permission to decrypt ciphertext data to plaintext using symmetric, asymmetric or DUKPT data encryption key

deletealias.name: DeleteAlias
deletealias.description: Grants permission to delete the specified alias

deletekey.name: DeleteKey
deletekey.description: Grants permission to schedule the deletion of a Key

encryptdata.name: EncryptData
encryptdata.description: Grants permission to encrypt plaintext data to ciphertext using symmetric, asymmetric or DUKPT data encryption key

exportkey.name: ExportKey
exportkey.description: Grants permission to export a key from the service

generatecardvalidationdata.name: GenerateCardValidationData
generatecardvalidationdata.description: Grants permission to generate card-related data using algorithms such as Card Verification Values (CVV/CVV2), Dynamic Card Verification Values (dCVV/dCVV2) or Card Security Codes (CSC) that check the validity of a magnetic stripe card

generatemac.name: GenerateMac
generatemac.description: Grants permission to generate a MAC (Message Authentication Code) cryptogram

generatemacemvpinchange.name: GenerateMacEmvPinChange
generatemacemvpinchange.description: Grants permission to generate a MAC (Message Authentication Code) cryptogram

generatepindata.name: GeneratePinData
generatepindata.description: Grants permission to generate pin-related data such as PIN, PIN Verification Value (PVV), PIN Block and PIN Offset during new card issuance or card re-issuance

getalias.name: GetAlias
getalias.description: Grants permission to return the keyArn associated with an aliasName

getkey.name: GetKey
getkey.description: Grants permission to return the detailed information about the specified key

getparametersforexport.name: GetParametersForExport
getparametersforexport.description: Grants permission to get the export token and the signing key certificate to initiate a TR-34 key export

getparametersforimport.name: GetParametersForImport
getparametersforimport.description: Grants permission to get the import token and the wrapping key certificate to initiate a TR-34 key import

getpublickeycertificate.name: GetPublicKeyCertificate
getpublickeycertificate.description: Grants permission to return the public key from a key of class PUBLIC_KEY

importkey.name: ImportKey
importkey.description: Grants permission to imports keys and public key certificates

listaliases.name: ListAliases
listaliases.description: Grants permission to return a list of aliases created for all keys in the caller's AWS account and Region

listkeys.name: ListKeys
listkeys.description: Grants permission to return a list of keys created in the caller's AWS account and Region

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to return a list of tags created in the caller's AWS account and Region

reencryptdata.name: ReEncryptData
reencryptdata.description: Grants permission to re-encrypt ciphertext using DUKPT, Symmetric and Asymmetric Data Encryption Keys

restorekey.name: RestoreKey
restorekey.description: Grants permission to cancel a scheduled key deletion if at any point during the waiting period a Key needs to be revived

startkeyusage.name: StartKeyUsage
startkeyusage.description: Grants permission to enable a disabled Key

stopkeyusage.name: StopKeyUsage
stopkeyusage.description: Grants permission to disable an enabled Key

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to add or overwrites one or more tags for the specified resource

translatepindata.name: TranslatePinData
translatepindata.description: Grants permission to translate encrypted PIN block from and to ISO 9564 formats 0,1,3,4

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to remove the specified tag or tags from the specified resource

updatealias.name: UpdateAlias
updatealias.description: Grants permission to change the key to which an alias is assigned, or unassign it from its current key

verifyauthrequestcryptogram.name: VerifyAuthRequestCryptogram
verifyauthrequestcryptogram.description: Grants permission to verify Authorization Request Cryptogram (ARQC) for a EMV chip payment card authorization

verifycardvalidationdata.name: VerifyCardValidationData
verifycardvalidationdata.description: Grants permission to verify card-related validation data using algorithms such as Card Verification Values (CVV/CVV2), Dynamic Card Verification Values (dCVV/dCVV2) and Card Security Codes (CSC)

verifymac.name: VerifyMac
verifymac.description: Grants permission to verify MAC (Message Authentication Code) of input data against a provided MAC

verifypindata.name: VerifyPinData
verifypindata.description: Grants permission to verify pin-related data such as PIN and PIN Offset using algorithms including VISA PVV and IBM3624
